channel.title: Help: RS2011 Remake online problem and jar
channel.description:
Hey everybody,
i got a question about the RS2011 Remake source ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,609126.msg4232286.html#msg4232286 )
because i got a client with it but there is no bin map etc... and i also can't seem to get it online i already port forwarded and for some reason it just doesnt seem to work on other pcs's
So the first question is: How can i make it into a .jar file
And the second one is: What do i need to do so it will work online
Thank you in advance,
and i'm sorry to bother all of you with my questions
Kind regards,
ClarityX

item.title: Help: RS2011 Remake online problem and jar
item.dc:creator: @clarityx2013 clarityx2013
item.description:
@clarityx2013 wrote:

Hey everybody,

i got a question about the RS2011 Remake source

i already port forwarded and for some reason it just doesnt seem to work on other pcs’s

So the first question is:

And the second one is:

Thank you in advance,
